name: Pimcore
tagline: Enterprise-ready Open Source PIM w/o license cost
description:
Pimcore is an award-winning data management and customer experience management software powered by open-source technology.
With Pimcore, thousands of customers globally, including Burger King, Audi, Peugeot, and IKEA, are building fully automated data management and customer experience management systems that create significant value for their businesses. Enterprises choose Pimcore because it seamlessly integrates 4 applications – Product Information Management (PIM), Digital Asset Management (DAM), Customer Experience Management (CMS/UX) and eCommerce.
The software is licensed open-source and available free of charge, while the company specializes in business consulting, solution consulting, integration & implementation, professional services & support, training and cloud hosting. Automating business processes becomes easy with Pimcore’s connectivity to any infrastructure and external software. Pimcore is recognized as Gartner ‘Cool Vendor’ 2018.
